casebody.data:
80 1822 Supr Court Joseph Marin vs David C McKinstry filed in the Clerks office Sept 7. 1822

M Dorr Clk

Joseph Maran vs David C McKinstry

Supreme Court

Replevin Damages fifty dollars — This action is brought to recover a certain pirogue, the property of the Pff, unlawfully taken and detained by the said Defendant, of the value of Twenty dollars, and over

The Clerk of the Supreme Court will issue a writ of Replevin in the above action returnable 3d Monday Septr Inst WM W Petit Atty for Pff

Detroit Septr 7. 1822
